attributes.action: Raise the legal age limit for sexual activities to 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the minimum legal age being raised for various things such as buying cigarettes/alcohol and having a higher age for taking driving tests etc, i feel that we should also be looking to raise the legal age of sexual consent. Please sign to raise the limit for the legal age of consent from 16 to 18, this may help tackle our cultural/social issues where more and more children are having children of their own.
